topic: AI Risk Management and Privacy

  entities:
    AI Risk Management Framework|Regulation
    Privacy-Enhancing Technologies|Technology
    TrustGen|Platform
    Generative Foundation Models|Model

  proposition: AI Risk Management Framework (AI RMF) 1.0 emphasizes privacy protection
    entity-attribute relationships:
    AI Risk Management Framework|VERSION|1.0
    AI Risk Management Framework|FOCUSES_ON|privacy protection

  proposition: AI RMF 1.0 encourages collecting only necessary data in specific circumstances
    entity-attribute relationships:
    AI Risk Management Framework|RECOMMENDS|data minimization

  proposition: AI RMF 1.0 respects users' privacy choices
    entity-attribute relationships:
    AI Risk Management Framework|SUPPORTS|user privacy choices

  proposition: AI RMF 1.0 avoids unnecessary data collection and intrusive behavior
    entity-attribute relationships:
    AI Risk Management Framework|PREVENTS|unnecessary data collection
    AI Risk Management Framework|PREVENTS|intrusive behavior

  proposition: Privacy-Enhancing Technologies (PETs) include data minimization methods
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Privacy-Enhancing Technologies|INCLUDES|data minimization methods

  proposition: PETs methods include de-identification and data aggregation
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Privacy-Enhancing Technologies|INCLUDES|de-identification
    Privacy-Enhancing Technologies|INCLUDES|data aggregation

  proposition: AI RMF 1.0 supports bidirectional privacy preservation
    entity-attribute relationships:
    AI Risk Management Framework|SUPPORTS|bidirectional privacy preservation

  proposition: Bidirectional privacy preservation protects both user input and model output
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Bidirectional privacy preservation|PROTECTS|user input
    Bidirectional privacy preservation|PROTECTS|model output

topic: Trustworthiness Guidelines for Generative Models

  entities:
    Trustworthiness Guidelines|Regulation
    Generative Foundation Models|Model

  proposition: Trustworthiness Guidelines for Generative Foundation Models are multifaceted
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Trustworthiness Guidelines|CHARACTERISTIC|multifaceted

  proposition: Guidelines aim to ensure trustworthiness across various sectors and applications
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Trustworthiness Guidelines|SCOPE|various sectors
    Trustworthiness Guidelines|SCOPE|various applications

  proposition: Trustworthiness cannot be defined by rigid, universal rules
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Trustworthiness|CHARACTERISTIC|not rigid
    Trustworthiness|CHARACTERISTIC|not universal

  proposition: Key considerations include legal compliance, ethics, and social responsibility
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Trustworthiness Guidelines|CONSIDERS|legal compliance
    Trustworthiness Guidelines|CONSIDERS|ethics
    Trustworthiness Guidelines|CONSIDERS|social responsibility

  proposition: Key considerations include risk management and user-centered design
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Trustworthiness Guidelines|CONSIDERS|risk management
    Trustworthiness Guidelines|CONSIDERS|user-centered design

  proposition: Guidelines address fairness, transparency, and human oversight
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Trustworthiness Guidelines|ADDRESSES|fairness
    Trustworthiness Guidelines|ADDRESSES|transparency
    Trustworthiness Guidelines|ADDRESSES|human oversight

  proposition: Guidelines focus on accountability, robustness, and ethical norms
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Trustworthiness Guidelines|FOCUSES_ON|accountability
    Trustworthiness Guidelines|FOCUSES_ON|robustness
    Trustworthiness Guidelines|FOCUSES_ON|ethical norms

  proposition: Guidelines provide a flexible framework for developers and researchers
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Trustworthiness Guidelines|PROVIDES|flexible framework

topic: TrustGen Benchmark Platform

  entities:
    TrustGen|Platform
    Metadata Curator|Module
    Test Case Builder|Module
    Contextual Variator|Module

  proposition: TrustGen is a dynamic benchmark platform for evaluating generative foundation models
    entity-attribute relationships:
    TrustGen|TYPE|dynamic benchmark platform
    TrustGen|EVALUATES|generative foundation models

  proposition: TrustGen has three core modules: Metadata Curator, Test Case Builder, and Contextual Variator
    entity-entity relationships:
    TrustGen|INCLUDES|Metadata Curator
    TrustGen|INCLUDES|Test Case Builder
    TrustGen|INCLUDES|Contextual Variator

  proposition: TrustGen evaluates three model categories: text-to-image, large language models, and vision-language models
    entity-attribute relationships:
    TrustGen|EVALUATES|text-to-image models
    TrustGen|EVALUATES|large language models
    TrustGen|EVALUATES|vision-language models

  proposition: TrustGen assesses models across seven trustworthiness dimensions
    entity-attribute relationships:
    TrustGen|ASSESSES|seven trustworthiness dimensions

  proposition: Dynamic benchmarks address limitations of traditional static benchmarks
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Dynamic benchmarks|ADDRESSES|limitations of static benchmarks

  proposition: Dynamic benchmarks automatically update test sets and metrics over time
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Dynamic benchmarks|FEATURE|automatic test set updates
    Dynamic benchmarks|FEATURE|automatic metrics updates

  proposition: Dynamic benchmarks keep pace with rapid generative AI model advances
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Dynamic benchmarks|ADAPTS_TO|rapid generative AI model advances

  proposition: Dynamic benchmarks can adapt to evolving societal requirements
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Dynamic benchmarks|ADAPTS_TO|evolving societal requirements

  proposition: Dynamic benchmarks prevent model memorization by introducing novel test cases
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Dynamic benchmarks|PREVENTS|model memorization

  proposition: TrustGen is designed to be effective, reproducible, user-friendly, and open-source
    entity-attribute relationships:
    TrustGen|CHARACTERISTIC|effective
    TrustGen|CHARACTERISTIC|reproducible
    TrustGen|CHARACTERISTIC|user-friendly
    TrustGen|CHARACTERISTIC|open-source

  proposition: TrustGen provides authentic assessments of generative model behavior
    entity-attribute relationships:
    TrustGen|PROVIDES|authentic model behavior assessments

  proposition: TrustGen continuously adapts to evolving ethical standards
    entity-attribute relationships:
    TrustGen|ADAPTS_TO|evolving ethical standards
